channel.title: Welcome to MirandaNet
channel.description: The MirandaNet Fellowship, founded in 1992, is an e-community of practice for international ICT policy makers, teachers, teacher educators, researchers and commercial developers who are passionate about digital technology in teaching and learning and about using technologies to promote cultural understanding and democratic participation.

item.title: MirandaNet - Home Page
item.description: We put details of the latest news and postings to the site on this page. There are also links to the latest newsletter.

item.title: MirandaNet - News
item.description: We put the latest news here.

item.description: MirandaNews goes out to every MirandaNet member.

item.title: MirandaNet - MirandaMods
item.description: Details of the next MirandaMod. Follow the link for full details including how to register.
